metadata.description:
Use playbook tags to display your automation ROI based on your own numbers.
Configure JobCodes which map jobs to salaries.
Then, update your playbooks with following playbook tag syntax to include in the ROI calculation:
#ROI - this indicates that the playbook should be included in ROI calculations
#ROI_<JobCode>_<Minutes> - this tells the ROI calculator to multiply the salary associated with the JobCode by the number of minutes for each playbook execution
Example:
IT salary is configured at $60/hr
Playbook X has the tags #ROI #ROI_IT_30
If it is executed (successfully) 5 times, the ROI calculation will be 5 * 60 * (30/60) = $150 ROI

name: roiCalculator
title: ROI Calculator
subTitle: Uses playbook tags to display an accurate automation ROI
